Articles.Content:
Hi all, decided to try this for the first time and hope you like it.

I just got my GOV(gears of vvaris) landing gear mod somewhat working and would like to put it to a good use.

The challenge is to make a shortest landing using GOV_piccolo and/or GOV_piccolo S landing gears.

RULES:

1. You must take off from runway

2. Turn around

3. Land in opposite direction

4. All parts must land with the plane

5. The distance is measured from the start (or end since you are landing in opposite direction as you take off) of the runway.

6. Use only ONE atmospheric engine

7. No parachutes

8. Must land manually. No ASAS or any other "cheating"

9. Landing gear must be placed 90 degrees to engine, With this I mean the normal airplane configuration.

You can find the landing gear mod here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/17081-Redstar-co-op-Airplane-parts

You need also Tosh cart plugin for the landing gear to work.
I'd give it a shot, but first i actually need an aircraft that will fly.
